files.description: Main EHI export page. Contains high-level description of EHI export capability: defines EHI, describes bulk and single/multi-patient export use cases, states export is in 'machine readable XML formats', and links to FHIR API documentation. No data dictionary, schema, or technical specifications.
Full-page screenshot of the main EHI export page showing the complete content: title, EHI definition, use cases, and export format description.

FHIR API documentation page linked from the EHI export page. Contains Drummond ONC certification disclosure, FHIR Server 1.0.0 API documentation covering 16 standard US Core/USCDI FHIR resources (AllergyIntolerance, CarePlan, CareTeam, Condition, Device, DocumentReference, Encounter, Goal, Immunization, Location, Medication, MedicationRequest, Observation, Patient, Practitioner, Procedure), and API Terms of Service. This is (g)(10) documentation, not (b)(10)-specific.
Full-page screenshot of the FHIR API documentation page showing the ONC certification disclosure and FHIR resource endpoint documentation.
Drummond Group ONC Health IT compliance certificate for PacEHR v20, 1 page. Confirms certification for criteria including (b)(10). Certificate No: 15.04.04.3137.Pace.20.00.1.221229, dated 12/29/2022.
